TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowDesignerStorageService

summary.span: Proporciona un servicio disponible para el host del Dise√±ador de flujo de trabajo de Windows para almacenar y recuperar los datos.

span.span: Provides a service available to the Windows Workflow Designer host to store and retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta interfaz se implementa y utiliza internamente por [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)], que es el host principal de [!INCLUDE[wfd2](~/includes/wfd2-md.md)].This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)], which is the primary host of the [!INCLUDE[wfd2](~/includes/wfd2-md.md)].
